title: FT: T206 Carolina Brights Evers for another CB HOFer
author: David R

posts.post_title: FT: T206 Carolina Brights Evers for another CB HOFer
posts.post_content:
I am trying to complete a HOF basic set with all the backs and I have two Evers cards (a Carolina Brights and a Hindu).  I am looking to trade the Carolina Brights  for another Carolina Brights HOFer.  I can trade both of these Carolina Brights (Puttman and Evers) for another HOFer and can also add cash if needed.  Please let me know if you have a CB HOFer to trade.

Thanks,
David R

I am interested. Let me know.

Lee

[quote name="tinkertoeverstochance" post=797353]If you decide to sell, I am interested. Let me know.[/QUOTE]

Ditto, I don't have trade bait, but would pay handsomely for this card....
interested in selling the Evers?  if so how much?
I need a Carolina Brights HOFer for my HOF back collection.  I have another Evers so I would like to trade this Evers for another Carolina Brights HOFer.
